unnormalised: Okay, return policies! Always a headache, na? Last Onam, bought a saree from a fancy online store in Mumbai. Colour wasn't what I expected. Returning it was easy, thankfully! Hope all retailers are this customer-friendly. Clear policies are a must, especially around Diwali! Imagine buying gifts and then not being able to return them. Total bakwas! Like, who needs that hassle after having biryani with the family?
